detaileddescription.para: cache_content_create_name: Creates a name in the local fs for a cached entry.
Creates a name in the local fs for a cached entry and creates the directories that whil contain this file.

parameterdescription.para: [OUT] buffer to be used for storing the name.
[IN] type of pathname to be created.
[OUT] Entry in Cache inode layer related to the file content entry.
[IN] resources allocated for the file content client.

simplesect.para: CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS if operation is a success, other values show an error.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_get_export_id: gets an export id from an export dirname.
Gets an export id from an export dirname.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] The dirname for the export_id dirname.

simplesect.para: -1 if failed, the export_id if successfull.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_get_inum: gets an inode number fronm a cache filename.
Gets an inode number fronm a cache filename.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] The filename to be parsed.

simplesect.para: 0 if failed, the inum if successfull.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_get_datapath : recovers the path for a file of a specified inum.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] path to the root of the directory in the cache for the related export entry
[IN] inode number for the file whose size is to be recovered.
[OUT] the absolute path of the file (must be at least a MAXPATHLEN length string).

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_recover_size: recovers the size of a data cached file.
Recovers the size of a data cached file.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] path to the root of the directory in the cache for the related export entry
[IN] inode number for the file whose size is to be recovered.

simplesect.para: the recovered size (as a off_t) or -1 is failed.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_get_cached_size: recovers the size of a data cached file.
Recovers the size of a data cached file.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] related pentry

simplesect.para: the recovered size (as a off_t) or -1 is failed.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_error_convert: Converts a cache_content_status to a cache_inode_status.
Converts a cache_content_status to a cache_inode_status.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] File content status to be converted.

simplesect.para: a cache_inode_status_t resulting from the conversion.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_fsal_seek_convert: converts a fsal_seek_t to unix offet.
Converts a fsal_seek_t to unix offet. Non absolulte fsal_seek_t will produce an error.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] FSAL Seek descriptor.
[OUT] pointer to the status.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_fsal_size_convert: converts a fsal_size_t to unix size.
Converts a fsal_seek_t to unix size.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] FSAL Seek descriptor.
[OUT] pointer to the status.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_prepare_directories: do the mkdir to set the data cache directories
do the mkdir to set the data cache directories.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] export list
[OUT] pointer to the status.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_valid: validates an entry to update its garbagge status.
Validates an error to update its garbagge status. Entry is supposed to be locked when this function is called !!

parameterdescription.para: [INOUT] entry to be validated.
[IN] can be set to CACHE_INODE_OP_GET or CACHE_INODE_OP_SET to show the type of operation done.
[INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_LRU_ERROR if an errorr occured in LRU management.

memberdef.argsstring: (char *datacache_path, unsigned int threshold_min, unsigned int threshold_max, int *p_bool_overflow, unsigned long *p_blocks_to_lwm)
memberdef.name: cache_content_check_threshold

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_check_threshold: check datacache filesystem's threshold.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] the datacache filesystem's path.
[IN] the low watermark for the filesystem (in percent).
[IN] the high watermark for the filesystem (in percent).
[OUT] boolean that indicates whether the FS overcomes the high watermark.
[OUT] if bool_overflow is set to true, this indicates the number of blocks to be purged in order to reach the low watermark.

simplesect.para: CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT if some argument has an unexpected value
CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR if an error occured while getting informations from datacache filesystem.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_local_cache_opendir: Open a local cache directory associated to an export entry.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] the path to the directory associated with the export entry
[OUT] pointer to trhe openend directory

simplesect.para: the handle to the directory or NULL is failed

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_test_cached: Tests if a given pentry_inode has already an associated data cache
Tests if a given pentry_inode has already an associated data cache. This is useful to recover data from a data cache built by a former server instance.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry in cache_inode layer for this file.
[IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
[IN] the related FSAL Context [OUT] returned status.

simplesect.para: CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS if entry is found, CACHE_CONTENT_NOT_FOUND if not found

memberdef.argsstring: (cache_content_dirinfo_t *directory, struct dirent *pdir_entry, unsigned int index, unsigned int mod)
memberdef.name: cache_content_local_cache_dir_iter

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_local_cache_dir_iter: iterate on a local cache directory to get the entry one by one

parameterdescription.para: [IN] the directory to be read
[IN] thread index for multithreaded flushes (first has index 0)
[IN] modulus for multithreaded flushes (number of threads)
[OUT] found dir_entry

simplesect.para: TRUE if OK, FALSE if NOK.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_local_cache_closedir: Close a local cache directory associated to an export entry.

parameterdescription.para: the handle to the directory to be closed

briefdescription.para: Management of the file content cache: miscellaneous functions.

detaileddescription.para:
Author
leibovic
Date
2006/01/18 07:29:11

1.14
cache_content_misc.c : Management of the file content cache, miscellaneous functions.
